Package net.sbbi.upnp.samples

Interface Summary
HelloWorldInterface Remote Interface for the HelloWorld example.
 

Class Summary
DiscoveryAdvertisementSample Sample class for discovery advertisement service sample.
HelloWorld Implementation of the HelloWorld example.
HelloWorldClient Client program for the HelloWorld example.
HelloWorldServer Server program for the HelloWorld example.
IGDAccessSample Sample class to access an UPNP device that implement the Internet Gateway Device specs This sample will simply print the device external ip.
IGDPortsTest This will use the net.sbbi.upnp.impls.InternetGatewayDevice class to discover IGD devices on the nework via the getDevices() method and try to open and then close port 9090 on the IGD device.
JDK5ManagmentAsUpnp Sample class to expose JRE 1.5 JVM MBeans as UPNP devices
MyDiscoveryEventsHandler  
MyStateVariableEventsHandler
